meanings.sent1: She completed her labors in the field under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent5: The labors of the firefighters saved the forest from the raging fire.

meanings.sent1: He labors in the fields from dawn till dusk to provide for his family.
meanings.sent2: She labors tirelessly to achieve her dreams of success.
